name: Ruby Receptionists
overview:
Ruby Receptionists is a Portland, Oregon-based virtual receptionist company.

At Ruby Receptionists we will handle your calls with care - answering your phone calls with your custom greeting, screening, announcing and transferring calls wherever you may work, and taking messages, offering voicemail, and providing helpful information when you’re away.

Our Receptionists have no canned speeches or conversations making your clients feel at ease that a person took their message instead of a machine. Our remote virtual receptionists and live phone answering service delivers the perfect mix of friendliness, charm, can-do attitude, and professionalism.

Visit our website and click on the 14 day trial to learn more about our free 14-Day Trial Offer, simply complete our form and we’ll send you an email with all the information you need to activate your trial account.

We look forward to helping you because here at Ruby our ultimate goal is to make you look good.
